components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to Multiple Networks In South Korea

incident_updates.body: We are observing recovery in SMS delivery delays when sending messages to multiple networks in South Korea. We will continue monitoring the service to ensure a full recovery. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, APAC

incident_updates.body: We continue to experience SMS delivery delays when sending messages to multiple networks in South Korea. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, APAC

scheduled_maintenances.name: United Kingdom Account Security Carrier Partner Maintenance - Vodafone

incident_updates.body:
Our carrier partner Vodafone United Kingdom is conducting a planned maintenance from 14 December 2024 at 15:00 PST until 14 December 2024 at 20:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for Vodafone United Kingdom customers.

Impacted Products: Verify Silent Network Auth, Lookup Identity Match, Lookup SIM Swap, Legacy Identity MatchAndAttributes

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - Verify Silent Network Auth
CARRIER NETWORK - Lookup Identity Match
CARRIER NETWORK - Lookup SIM Swap
CARRIER NETWORK - Legacy Identity MatchAndAttributes

scheduled_maintenances.name: United States SMS and MMS Carrier Maintenance - T-Mobile

incident_updates.body: The T-Mobile network in the United States is conducting a planned maintenance from 15 December 2024 at 07:00 PST until 15 December 2024 at 11:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS and MMS to and from T-Mobile United States handsets.
